summary: Distance on ScaleBarOverlay in metric unit

comments.content:
Change the format of metric output of distances in metric unit.

Old Version: 0.1km - 0.6km - 1km - 2km
New Version: 120m - 644m - 1.1km - 2.3km - 10km

here's the patch

regards,

Martin
Is this issue still relevant, or can we close it?
it's outdated, has been fixed by a different patch.
